resilience.name: Resilience

effects.description: Permanently increases defense by 1.

resilience.description: Developed resilience to endure more hits in battle by increasing armor.

loneWolf.name: Lone Wolf

effects.description: Permanently increases accuracy by 1.

loneWolf.description: You got better when fighting alone. Increase accuracy and dodge.

effects.description: Permanently increases vitality by 2.

combatAwareness.name: Combat Awareness

effects.description: Permanently increases evasion by 1.

combatAwareness.description: Heightened awareness allows you to anticipate and evade attacks.

staminaSurge.name: Stamina Surge
staminaSurge.description: Increases stamina regeneration by 5 per second.

spiritGuidance.name: Spirit Guidance
spiritGuidance.description: Increases mana regeneration for all allies.

shamanicFury.name: Shamanic Fury
shamanicFury.description: Increases magic power of all allies.

earthsBlessing.name: Earth's Blessing
earthsBlessing.description: Increases the health of all allies.

healingAura.name: Healing Aura
healingAura.description: Continuously heals all allies in range.

manaSurge.name: Mana Surge
manaSurge.description: Increases mana regeneration for all allies.

alchemicalMastery.name: Alchemical Mastery
alchemicalMastery.description: Increases the duration of all debuffs applied by the Goblin Alchemist.

burningRage.name: Burning Rage
burningRage.description: Increases fire damage dealt, but also increases the chance of hitting allies.

uncontrolledFlames.name: Uncontrolled Flames
uncontrolledFlames.description: Increases the chance of fire attacks hitting allies.

beastmastersBond.name: Beastmaster's Bond
beastmastersBond.description: Increases the health of all summoned beasts.

untamedFury.name: Untamed Fury
untamedFury.description: Increases the critical hit chance of all summoned beasts.

unstoppableRage.name: Unstoppable Rage
unstoppableRage.description: Passively increases damage dealt as the Berserker takes more damage.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.description: Heals a small amount of health whenever the Berserker kills an enemy.

leadersFortitude.name: Leaders Fortitude
leadersFortitude.description: Increases the health of all allied goblins.

inspiringAura.name: Inspiring Aura
inspiringAura.description: Increases the speed of all allied goblins.

archeryMastery.name: Archery Mastery
archeryMastery.description: Permanently increases damage dealt with bows.

marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
marksmanship.description: Permanently increases damage with ranged weapons.

lockpicking.name: Lockpicking
lockpicking.description: Increases the ability to pick locks.

criticalStrike.name: Critical Strike
criticalStrike.description: Permanently increases chance of landing critical strikes.

silentMovement.name: Silent Movement
silentMovement.description: Reduces the chance of being detected while moving.

trapSense.name: Trap Sense
trapSense.description: Increases the chance to detect traps.

lightArmorExpertise.name: Light Armor Expertise
lightArmorExpertise.description: Increases the effectiveness of light armor.

guardianProtocol.name: Guardian Protocol
guardianProtocol.description: When critically damaged, the Sentry initiates a last-stand defense, boosting its power.

infernoLightningFocus.name: Inferno-Lightning Focus

effects.description: Permanently increases Fire damage by 10%.
Permanently increases Lightning damage by 10%.

infernoLightningFocus.description: Deepened understanding of volatile energies enhances both Fire and Lightning spell potency.

fireLightningSynergy.name: Fire-Lightning Synergy

effects.description: Fire and Lightning spells empower each other; casting one slightly reduces the cost of the other type for a short duration.

fireLightningSynergy.description: The interplay of fire and lightning allows for more efficient casting when alternating between the elements.

stormOfFire.name: Storm of Fire

effects.description: Your area effect Fire and Lightning spells have a chance to leave behind a lingering elemental storm.

stormOfFire.description: Your mastery over chaotic elements allows area of effect Fire and Lightning spells to occasionally leave behind a swirling storm of energy, damaging foes within.

masterOfChargedFlames.name: Master of Charged Flames

effects.description: Critical hits with Fire or Lightning spells unleash an additional discharge of energy, striking nearby foes.

masterOfChargedFlames.description: Ultimate control over electrified fire causes critical hits from Fire or Lightning spells to erupt with secondary elemental discharges, damaging nearby enemies.

steamFocus.name: Steam Focus

effects.description: Permanently increases the damage of Steam-based spells by 15%.

steamFocus.description: Specialized study into hydro-thermal dynamics enhances the potency of all Steam-based spells.

fireWaterSynergy.name: Fire-Water Synergy

effects.description: Alternating Fire and Water/Steam spells enhances their effects. Fire spells increase subsequent Water/Steam damage briefly; Water spells increase subsequent Fire/Steam critical chance briefly.

fireWaterSynergy.description: The mingling of fire and water energies creates a potent synergy, enhancing spells that combine these elements or are cast in sequence.

miasmaControl.name: Miasma Control

effects.description: Increases the duration and area of effect of mist and cloud-based Steam spells.

miasmaControl.description: Greater control over gaseous concoctions allows for larger and longer-lasting steam and mist effects.

masterOfVapors.name: Master of Vapors

effects.description: Steam spells have a chance to condense on targets, dealing bonus Water damage and soaking them.

masterOfVapors.description: Unrivaled mastery over vapors allows Steam spells to occasionally condense with force, dealing additional Water damage and soaking targets.

runicPyromancyFocus.name: Runic Pyromancy Focus

effects.description: Spells that are both Fire and Rune based deal 15% increased damage.

runicPyromancyFocus.description: Deep focus on the intersection of runic magic and pyromancy enhances the damage of Fire spells that utilize runes.

fireRunestoneSynergy.name: Fire-Runestone Synergy

effects.description: Casting a Fire spell charges your runic attunement, making your next Fire Rune spell cost less mana. Placing a Fire Rune temporarily increases your Fire spell critical chance.

fireRunestoneSynergy.description: The weaving of direct flame and inscribed runes creates a powerful arcane feedback loop, enhancing both types of magic when used in concert.

masterRunecarverFire.name: Master Runecarver (Fire)

effects.description: Fire runes arm faster and have a larger area of effect.

masterRunecarverFire.description: Exceptional skill in carving fire runes allows them to arm more quickly and affect a larger area.

ancientFlameKnowledge.name: Ancient Flame Knowledge
ancientFlameKnowledge.description: Rediscovered secrets of primordial fire grant your Fire spells the ability to partially bypass enemy resistances, and your Fire Runes' burning effects may spread to new victims.

bloodFireFocus.name: Bloodfire Focus
bloodFireFocus.description: Your affinity for blood-fueled pyromancy increases Fire damage, especially when your own life force wanes.

sanguinePyromancy.name: Sanguine Pyromancy
sanguinePyromancy.description: Your fire magic is tainted with blood, giving it a chance to cause bleeding wounds. Using blood magic stokes your inner fire, empowering subsequent pyromancy.

masterOfCrimsonFlames.name: Master of Crimson Flames
masterOfCrimsonFlames.description: Your critical fire spells sear flesh and draw forth vitality, healing you for a portion of the critical damage inflicted.

forbiddenPower.name: Forbidden Power
forbiddenPower.description: Embracing forbidden magics grants immense spell power at the cost of a portion of your vitality.

soulfireNecromancyFocus.name: Soulfire Necromancy Focus
soulfireNecromancyFocus.description: Increases the damage of both Fire and Necrotic spells, reflecting a mastery over soul-burning energies.

fireNecromancySynergy.name: Fire-Necromancy Synergy

effects.description: Fire spells cast on Undead allies have a chance to slightly heal them. Necrotic spells cast on Burning enemies deal bonus damage or prolong the burn.

fireNecromancySynergy.description: The unholy fusion of fire and undeath creates unique interactions, allowing flames to mend the dead and necrotic energies to feast on burning flesh.

masterOfUndeadFlames.name: Master of Undead Flames

effects.description: Your summoned undead have a 25% chance to explode in a fiery burst upon death.

masterOfUndeadFlames.description: Your command over fiery undead is such that they detonate in a burst of flame upon their final demise.

lichFormPassive.name: Lich Form (Passive)

effects.description: A portion of damage taken is absorbed by mana before health.

lichFormPassive.description: Embracing the path of the lich grants inherent resistances to unholy energies and poisons, and the ability to shield vitality with arcane reserves.

lightfooted.name: Lightfooted

effects.description: Permanently increases dodge by 2.
Permanently increases movement speed by 5%.

lightfooted.description: Years of practice have made your movements quieter and more agile, making you harder to hit and faster on your feet.

opportunist.name: Opportunist

effects.name: Opportunist
effects.description: Deal 10% increased damage to enemies suffering from negative status effects (e.g., stun, bleed, poison).

opportunist.description: You excel at exploiting weaknesses, dealing increased damage to foes hindered by status effects.

poisonResistanceBasic.name: Basic Poison Resistance

effects.description: Grants 10 flat resistance to Poison damage.

poisonResistanceBasic.description: Developed a tolerance to common poisons, reducing their effectiveness.

weaponMastery.name: Weapon Mastery

effects.description: Increases accuracy with melee weapons by 2.
Increases damage with melee weapons by 1.

weaponMastery.description: Extensive training with various melee weapons has honed your combat prowess, increasing accuracy and damage.

toughness.name: Toughness

effects.description: Permanently increases Vitality by 5.
Reduces all incoming damage by 1.

toughness.description: Your body has become hardened, increasing your maximum health and resilience to damage.

armorExpertise.name: Armor Expertise

effects.description: Increases the effectiveness of equipped armor by 10%.

armorExpertise.description: You know how to wear armor for maximum protection, increasing its effectiveness.

battleHardened.name: Battle Hardened

effects.description: Increased resistance to Fear effects.
Increased resistance to Stun effects.

battleHardened.description: Numerous battles have steeled your resolve, making you more resistant to fear and stuns.

spellPower.name: Spell Power

effects.description: Permanently increases Magic Power by 10.

spellPower.description: Your innate connection to magical energies is stronger, boosting your overall spell power.

manaFont.name: Mana Font

effects.description: Increases maximum Mana by 50.
Increases Mana regeneration by 2 per second.

manaFont.description: You are a wellspring of magical energy, possessing a larger mana pool and faster regeneration.

elementalAttunement.name: Elemental Attunement
elementalAttunement.description: A basic understanding of elemental forces grants minor resistance to all primary elemental damage types.

arcaneFocus.name: Arcane Focus

effects.description: Increases damage dealt by Arcane spells by 8%.
Reduces mana cost of Arcane spells by 5%.

arcaneFocus.description: Intense concentration on the arcane arts enhances the power and efficiency of your Arcane spells.

divineGrace.name: Divine Grace

effects.description: Increases all healing done by 10%.
Your healing spells have a 15% chance to also grant a minor protective blessing (Armor +5 for 2 turns).

divineGrace.description: A touch of divine favor enhances your healing abilities and occasionally bestows a minor protective blessing on those you mend.

holyMight.name: Holy Might

effects.description: Increases damage dealt by Holy spells and effects by 12%.

holyMight.description: Your divine power infuses your offensive spells, increasing their Holy damage.

faithUnwavering.name: Faith Unwavering

effects.description: Spells are 10% more effective when below 25% Mana.

faithUnwavering.description: Your steadfast faith makes you highly resistant to fear and charm, and empowers your abilities when your spiritual reserves are low.

daggerSpecialization.name: Dagger Specialization
daggerSpecialization.description: Focused training with daggers increases damage dealt and critical hit chance when wielding them.

improvedCriticals.name: Improved Criticals

effects.description: Increases overall critical hit chance by 5%.
Increases critical hit damage by 10%.

improvedCriticals.description: You have learned to strike vital points more often and with greater force, improving both critical hit chance and damage.

masterOfShadows.name: Master of Shadows
masterOfShadows.description: Your mastery of stealth allows you to remain hidden longer and strike with devastating force from the shadows.

bowMastery.name: Bow Mastery
bowMastery.description: Extensive practice with bows has increased your damage and accuracy with these ranged weapons.

eagleEyePassive.name: Eagle Eye (Passive)

effects.description: Permanently increases accuracy with ranged weapons by 5.

eagleEyePassive.description: Your keen eyesight grants a permanent bonus to accuracy with all ranged weapons.

rangedPrecision.name: Ranged Precision

effects.description: Ranged attacks are 25% more effective against targets in partial cover.

rangedPrecision.description: Your precise aim increases critical hit chance with ranged weapons and allows you to better target foes behind cover.

dualWieldExpertise.name: Dual Wield Expertise

effects.description: Reduces off-hand attack penalties by 50% when dual-wielding.

dualWieldExpertise.description: Mastery in fighting with two weapons reduces typical penalties and slightly increases attack speed.

ambidexterity.name: Ambidexterity

effects.description: Increases the damage dealt by your off-hand weapon by 15%.

ambidexterity.description: You are equally skilled with both hands, making your off-hand attacks more potent.

preciseFootwork.name: Precise Footwork

effects.description: Grants +3 Dodge.
Gain +5% Crit Chance for 1 turn after moving.

preciseFootwork.description: Your agile and precise movements make you harder to hit and allow for opportunistic strikes after repositioning.

offensiveStance.name: Offensive Stance

effects.description: Reduces armor by 5.

offensiveStance.description: You adopt a highly aggressive fighting style, increasing your damage output at the cost of some defensive capability.

oneHandedFocus.name: One-Handed Focus
oneHandedFocus.description: Specialization in one-handed weaponry improves your damage and accuracy when wielding such arms.

duelistStance.name: Duelist Stance
duelistStance.description: When facing a single opponent, your focus sharpens, increasing your critical hit chance and ability to dodge.

improvedParry.name: Improved Parry

effects.description: Successfully parrying an attack has a 25% chance to grant an immediate riposte opportunity or counter-attack buff.

improvedParry.description: Your parrying skill is enhanced, granting a chance for an immediate counter-attack after a successful parry.

combatReflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
combatReflexes.description: Your reflexes are exceptionally sharp, slightly increasing your dodge chance and giving you a small chance to act first in combat turns.

shieldMastery.name: Shield Mastery
shieldMastery.description: Expertise with shields increases your chance to block and the protection afforded by your shield.

unbreakableDefense.name: Unbreakable Defense

effects.description: Successfully blocking an attack reduces the damage taken by an additional 20%.

unbreakableDefense.description: Your defensive posture is nearly impenetrable; successfully blocked attacks deal significantly less damage.

vigilance.name: Vigilance
vigilance.description: Constant alertness makes you less likely to be critically hit and better at spotting traps and ambushes.

tenacity.name: Tenacity

effects.description: Reduces duration of negative status effects on self by 15%.

tenacity.description: Sheer willpower makes you more resistant to stuns and knockdowns, and helps you shake off negative effects faster.

twoHandedPower.name: Two-Handed Power

effects.description: Power attacks with two-handed weapons have a 5% increased chance to stun.

twoHandedPower.description: Wielding a two-handed weapon grants a significant increase in raw damage output and a better chance to stun with powerful strikes.

heavyImpact.name: Heavy Impact

effects.description: Attacks with two-handed weapons have a 10% chance to knock enemies back.

heavyImpact.description: The sheer force of your two-handed weapon strikes can send foes reeling.

unyieldingStrength.name: Unyielding Strength
unyieldingStrength.description: Your immense physical strength bolsters your might and reduces the stamina cost of physical skills used with two-handed weapons.

berserkerMight.name: Berserker Might

effects.description: Deal 20% increased damage with two-handed weapons when below 30% health.

berserkerMight.description: When gravely wounded, your berserk fury intensifies, greatly increasing the damage of your two-handed weapon attacks.

pyromancyExpertise.name: Pyromancy Expertise

effects.description: Burn effects from your spells are 15% more likely to apply.

pyromancyExpertise.description: Deep knowledge of fire magic increases the damage of your Fire spells and the likelihood of inflicting burns.

burningSoul.name: Burning Soul

effects.description: Each time one of your burn effects deals damage, you have a 20% chance to restore 5 Mana.

burningSoul.description: Your soul burns with an inner fire; each tick of your burn damage over time effects has a chance to restore a small amount of mana.

enhancedFireDamage.name: Enhanced Fire Damage
enhancedFireDamage.description: Further augments your ability to command fire, increasing your effective Magic Power for Fire spells by 15.

manaEfficiencyFire.name: Mana Efficiency (Fire)
manaEfficiencyFire.description: You cast Fire spells with greater efficiency, reducing their mana cost by 15%.

geomancyExpertise.name: Geomancy Expertise

effects.description: Slowing effects from your Earth spells are 15% more likely to apply or are more potent.

geomancyExpertise.description: Deep knowledge of earth magic increases the damage of your Earth spells and the effectiveness of their slowing effects.

earthAttunement.name: Earth Attunement

effects.description: Earth spells deal 10% more damage if you haven't moved this turn.

earthAttunement.description: Your connection to the earth grants minor physical resistance and empowers your Earth spells when you stand firm.

terraStability.name: Terra Stability
terraStability.description: You are as rooted as the mountains, gaining significant resistance to being knocked back or knocked down.

hydromancyExpertise.name: Hydromancy Expertise

effects.description: Water-based healing spells are 10% more effective.

hydromancyExpertise.description: Deep knowledge of water magic increases the damage of your Water spells and the potency of water-based healing.

chillingPresence.name: Chilling Presence

effects.description: Enemies near you are slightly slowed by a chilling aura.

chillingPresence.description: Your affinity for cold magic projects a faint chilling aura, slightly slowing nearby enemies.

fluidMovement.name: Fluid Movement
fluidMovement.description: You move like water, increasing your dodge chance and occasionally restoring mana when you evade an attack.

waterAffinity.name: Water Affinity
waterAffinity.description: A strong affinity for water grants increased resistance to Water and Ice damage, and reduces the mana cost of Water spells.

aeromancyExpertise.name: Aeromancy Expertise

effects.description: Knockback effects from your Air spells are 10% more likely to occur or are stronger.

aeromancyExpertise.description: Deep knowledge of air and storm magic increases the damage of Air and Lightning spells, and enhances the force of wind-based knockbacks.

stormcallerAdept.name: Stormcaller Adept

effects.description: Your single-target Lightning spells have a 15% chance to chain to one additional nearby enemy for 50% damage.

stormcallerAdept.description: Your command over lightning allows single-target electrical spells a chance to arc to a nearby secondary target.

swiftWinds.name: Swift Winds
swiftWinds.description: The winds are at your command, increasing your movement speed and slightly reducing the cooldown of Air spells.

lightningAffinity.name: Lightning Affinity
lightningAffinity.description: A strong affinity for storms grants increased resistance to Lightning and Air damage, and reduces the mana cost of Lightning spells.

summoningProwess.name: Summoning Prowess

effects.description: Summoned minions have 15% more health.

summoningProwess.description: Your skill in summoning reduces the mana cost of summoning spells and makes your minions more durable.

minionDurability.name: Minion Durability
minionDurability.description: Your summoned creatures are tougher, possessing increased armor and resistances.

expandedMindSummoner.name: Expanded Mind (Summoner)
expandedMindSummoner.description: Your mental capacity for controlling summoned entities expands, allowing you to maintain an additional minion and increasing your maximum mana.

pactMagic.name: Pact Magic

effects.description: A portion (5%) of the damage dealt by your minions is siphoned back to you as healing.

pactMagic.description: The bond with your summoned creatures is strong; a small fraction of the damage they inflict is transferred to you as life force.

pureArcana.name: Pure Arcana

effects.description: Your Arcane spells ignore 10% of the target's Arcane resistance.

pureArcana.description: Your devotion to pure arcane magic intensifies its power, increasing Arcane damage and allowing your spells to partially bypass resistances.

spellWeaving.name: Spell Weaving

effects.description: Consecutively casting Arcane spells grants a stacking Magic Power bonus (up to 3 stacks).

spellWeaving.description: Seamlessly weaving arcane energies empowers your subsequent Arcane spells with stacking magical might.

arcaneMastery.name: Arcane Mastery

effects.description: Reduces the chance of complex Arcane spells backfiring or fizzling by 5% (if applicable).

arcaneMastery.description: Your supreme command over arcane forces improves your magical control and reduces the chance of mishaps with complex spells.

manaConservation.name: Mana Conservation
manaConservation.description: You channel arcane energies with utmost efficiency, significantly reducing the mana cost of all Arcane spells.

smiteSpecialization.name: Smite Specialization
smiteSpecialization.description: Your focus on divine retribution enhances the damage and critical hit chance of your Smite abilities.

radiantPower.name: Radiant Power

effects.description: Your Holy damage spells have a 10% chance to briefly blind the target.

radiantPower.description: The sheer intensity of your holy magic can overwhelm foes, occasionally blinding them.

unwaveringFaith.name: Unyielding Faith

effects.description: Mana regeneration is increased by 50% when below 40% health.

unwaveringFaith.description: Your profound faith bolsters your spiritual energy when weakened and shields you from curses. (This is different from Warrior's `faithUnwavering`).

divineMight.name: Divine Might
divineMight.description: Your connection to the divine amplifies your holy spell power considerably.

healingMastery.name: Healing Mastery
healingMastery.description: Your mastery over restorative magic increases the potency of your healing spells and reduces their mana cost.

lifeGiver.name: Life Giver

effects.description: 25% of overhealing is converted into a temporary protective shield on the target (max 10% of target's max HP).

lifeGiver.description: Excess healing energy you provide manifests as a temporary protective barrier on your allies.

serenity.name: Serenity
serenity.description: Your calm demeanor reduces the threat generated by your healing, and allows for faster mana recovery outside of combat.

empatheticHealing.name: Empathetic Healing

effects.description: When you heal an ally, you also restore 10% of that amount to yourself.

empatheticHealing.description: Your deep empathy allows you to draw a small amount of restorative energy for yourself whenever you heal an ally.

supportAdept.name: Support Adept
supportAdept.description: Your proficiency with supportive magic increases the duration of beneficial effects you apply to allies and detrimental effects on enemies.

auraOfProtectionPassive.name: Aura of Protection (Passive)

effects.description: A constant divine aura grants minor armor to nearby allies.

auraOfProtectionPassive.description: You constantly emanate a protective divine aura, granting a small amount of armor to nearby allies.

focusedMind.name: Focused Mind

effects.description: Increased resistance to spell interruption.

focusedMind.description: Your mental discipline makes you highly resistant to silence effects and spell interruptions.

divineClarity.name: Divine Clarity

effects.description: Dispelling effects from your Utility spells are 10% more likely to succeed.

divineClarity.description: Your divine understanding allows you to cast utility spells more efficiently and enhances the success rate of your dispel magics.

lethalPrecision.name: Lethal Precision

effects.description: Critical hits deal an additional 15% damage to targets below 50% health.

lethalPrecision.description: Your attacks are precisely aimed for maximum lethality, increasing critical hit chance and dealing extra critical damage to wounded foes. (Shadowsting Assassin)

critMultiplierUp.name: Critical Multiplier Up
critMultiplierUp.description: Your critical strikes hit exceptionally hard, significantly increasing their damage multiplier. (Shadowsting Assassin)

daggerCritFocus.name: Dagger Critical Focus
daggerCritFocus.description: You specialize in landing critical blows with daggers, greatly enhancing both their chance and damage. (Shadowsting Assassin)

shadowVeil.name: Shadow Veil

effects.description: Critical hits have a 10% chance to briefly shroud you in shadows, granting temporary stealth.

shadowVeil.description: Your deadly critical strikes sometimes allow you to melt back into the shadows, briefly becoming stealthed. (Shadowsting Assassin)

speedMastery.name: Speed Mastery
speedMastery.description: Your movements are a blur, increasing your overall attack speed and reducing the cooldown of speed-focused abilities. (Swiftblade Phantom)

daggerSpeedFocus.name: Dagger Speed Focus
daggerSpeedFocus.description: You wield daggers with blinding speed, greatly increasing attack speed and occasionally landing an extra swift strike. (Swiftblade Phantom)

relentlessAssault.name: Relentless Assault

effects.description: Each successful melee hit grants a small, stacking bonus to attack speed for a short duration.

relentlessAssault.description: You press the attack relentlessly, each blow making you faster. (Swiftblade Phantom)

untouchable.name: Untouchable
untouchable.description: Your evasiveness is legendary. You gain a permanent dodge bonus, and successfully dodging an attack grants a burst of speed. (Swiftblade Phantom)

bleedMastery.name: Bleed Mastery
bleedMastery.description: You are an expert at inflicting grievous wounds, increasing the damage and duration of your bleed effects. (Crimson Fang)

daggerBleedFocus.name: Dagger Bleed Focus

effects.description: Attacks with daggers have a 20% chance to inflict a significantly more potent bleed.

daggerBleedFocus.description: Your dagger strikes are aimed to open deep, gushing wounds, often causing more severe bleeding. (Crimson Fang)

sadisticIntent.name: Sadistic Intent

effects.description: You deal 10% increased damage to targets that are currently bleeding.

sadisticIntent.description: You take grim satisfaction in your opponent's suffering, dealing increased damage to bleeding targets. (Crimson Fang)

bloodScent.name: Blood Scent

effects.description: The scent of blood from a wounded, bleeding foe sharpens your senses, granting +15% critical hit chance against them.

bloodScent.description: The aroma of blood excites you, granting significantly increased critical hit chance against badly wounded and bleeding enemies. (Crimson Fang)

poisonExpertise.name: Poison Expertise
poisonExpertise.description: You have an advanced understanding of toxins, increasing the damage and duration of your poison effects. (Venomshank Trickster)

daggerPoisonFocus.name: Dagger Poison Focus

effects.description: When applying poison with a dagger, there's a 25% chance to apply an additional stack of the same poison.

daggerPoisonFocus.description: Your skill with poisoned daggers allows you to sometimes deliver a double dose of venom with a single strike. (Venomshank Trickster)

masterAlchemist.name: Master Alchemist

effects.description: Reduces time/resources needed to craft poisons (if applicable).

masterAlchemist.description: Your alchemical mastery extends the duration of all your applied poisons and allows you to concoct them more efficiently. (Venomshank Trickster)

potentToxins.name: Potent Toxins

effects.description: Your poisons are so virulent they can now critically hit, dealing bonus damage.

potentToxins.description: You've refined your poisons to an exceptional degree of deadliness, allowing their damaging ticks to critically strike. (Venomshank Trickster)

evasionMastery.name: Evasion Mastery

effects.description: 50% chance to regain 10 Stamina after successfully dodging an attack.

evasionMastery.description: Your mastery of evasion is unparalleled, granting a significant bonus to dodge and a chance to regain stamina upon successfully avoiding an attack. (Nightwind Acrobat)

daggerEvasionFocus.name: Dagger Evasion Focus

effects.description: Gain +4 Dodge for 1 turn after attacking with a dagger.

daggerEvasionFocus.description: Wielding daggers enhances your evasive maneuvers, granting a temporary dodge bonus after you attack. (Nightwind Acrobat)

gracefulDodger.name: Graceful Dodger

effects.description: When you successfully dodge an attack, you also take 25% less damage from Area of Effect attacks for that turn.

gracefulDodger.description: Your graceful evasions also help you mitigate damage from area attacks. (Nightwind Acrobat)

unpredictableMotion.name: Unpredictable Motion

effects.description: When an enemy misses you with an attack, their accuracy is reduced by 10 for their next attack against you.

unpredictableMotion.description: Your erratic movements make you a difficult target. Enemies that miss you become frustrated, slightly reducing their accuracy on their next attempt. (Nightwind Acrobat)

poisonExpertiseArchery.name: Poison Expertise (Archery)
poisonExpertiseArchery.description: Your knowledge of toxins allows your arrow-delivered poisons to be more potent and last longer.

effects.description: Poisons applied by Bow skills deal 25% more damage.
Poisons applied by Bow skills last 1 turn longer.

stoneSkin.name: Stone Skin
stoneSkin.description: Your skin toughens like stone, granting increased armor and resistance to physical damage.

effects.description: Permanently increases armor by 10.
Permanently increases Physical resistance by 5.

fleetFooted.name: Fleet Footed
fleetFooted.description: Years of practice in quick, precise movements grant increased speed and a chance to gain a burst of celerity after dealing critical damage with daggers.

effects.description: Permanently increases movement speed by 8%.
Permanently increases dodge by 3.

critMasteryRanged.name: Ranged Critical Mastery
critMasteryRanged.description: Your mastery of ranged combat allows you to land more devastating critical hits.

effects.description: Increases critical hit chance with ranged weapons by 5%.
Increases critical hit damage with ranged weapons by 15%.

bowCritFocus.name: Bow Critical Focus
bowCritFocus.description: Specialized training with bows further increases their critical potential, allowing critical shots to pierce some armor.

effects.description: Increases critical hit chance with bows by an additional 7%.
Critical hits with bows ignore 25% of the target's armor.

deadeyeAura.name: Deadeye's Aura
deadeyeAura.description: Your focused presence inspires allies, increasing their critical strike chance against enemies you have marked.

effectsInAura.description: Allies gain +10% critical hit chance against targets marked by your Hunter's Mark.

precisionKing.name: King of Precision
precisionKing.description: Your first attack in combat is a guaranteed critical hit. This effect resets after a short time out of combat.

effects.description: The first attack you make in any combat encounter is a guaranteed critical hit.

speedFocusArchery.name: Archery Speed Focus
speedFocusArchery.description: Years of practice have increased your firing speed and allow you to move more swiftly.

effects.description: Increases attack speed with ranged weapons by 10%.
Increases movement speed by 5%.

bowSpeedFocus.name: Bow Speed Focus
bowSpeedFocus.description: Specialized training with bows allows for an even faster rate of fire.

effects.description: Increases attack speed with bows by an additional 15%.

lightningReflexesArcher.name: Lightning Reflexes (Archer)
lightningReflexesArcher.description: Your reflexes are so fast that you sometimes fire an extra arrow in the blink of an eye.

effects.description: Your bow attacks have a 10% chance to fire an additional arrow for 60% damage.

unseenArrow.name: Unseen Arrow
unseenArrow.description: Your arrows fly so fast they are nearly impossible to dodge or block. Increases accuracy and ignores a portion of the enemy's block chance.

effects.description: Your ranged attacks ignore 25% of the target's block chance.

bleedMasteryArchery.name: Bleed Mastery (Archery)
bleedMasteryArchery.description: Your knowledge of anatomy allows your barbed arrows to inflict deeper, more painful wounds.

effects.description: Your Bleed effects deal 25% more damage.
Your Bleed effects last 1 turn longer.

bowBleedFocus.name: Bow Bleed Focus
bowBleedFocus.description: You are adept at making enemies bleed with bow attacks, increasing the chance to apply such effects.

effects.description: Increased chance to apply Bleed with Bows.

painfulPrecision.name: Painful Precision
painfulPrecision.description: Your precise shots against bleeding targets are particularly vicious, dealing bonus damage.

effects.description: Deal 15% increased damage to bleeding targets.

bloodTracker.name: Blood Tracker
bloodTracker.description: The scent of blood sharpens your aim. You gain increased accuracy and critical chance against low-health enemies.

bowPoisonFocus.name: Bow Poison Focus
bowPoisonFocus.description: You are skilled at delivering poisons via arrows, increasing the chance to apply them.

effects.description: Increased chance to apply Poison with Bows.

masterToxicologist.name: Master Toxicologist
masterToxicologist.description: Your advanced knowledge of toxins allows you to create poisons that weaken the target's resistances.

effects.description: Your poisons also reduce all resistances of the target.

virulentArrows.name: Virulent Arrows
virulentArrows.description: Your arrow-delivered poisons are exceptionally virulent, lasting longer and dealing more damage.

evasionMasteryArchery.name: Evasion Mastery (Archery)
evasionMasteryArchery.description: Your constant movement and awareness make you an exceptionally difficult target to hit.

bowEvasionFocus.name: Bow Evasion Focus
bowEvasionFocus.description: Wielding a bow enhances your evasive capabilities. You gain a temporary dodge bonus after firing a shot.

mistwalkerGuile.name: Mistwalker's Guile
mistwalkerGuile.description: You move like mist on the wind. After successfully dodging an attack, you briefly become stealthed.

elusiveTarget.name: Elusive Target
elusiveTarget.description: Enemies find it hard to land a solid blow on you. Reduces the critical hit chance of attacks against you.

dualWieldCritFocus.name: Dual Wield Critical Focus
dualWieldCritFocus.description: Your skill with two weapons allows for exceptionally precise and deadly critical strikes.

critMasteryMelee.name: Melee Critical Mastery
critMasteryMelee.description: You have an innate sense for finding weaknesses in close combat, increasing your overall melee critical chance.

bladeArtistry.name: Blade Artistry
bladeArtistry.description: Your elegant and artistic blade work is deceptively deadly, granting a bonus to both accuracy and critical damage.

ferociousStrikes.name: Ferocious Strikes
ferociousStrikes.description: Your critical strikes are particularly ferocious, having a chance to cause the enemy to bleed.

dualWieldSpeedFocus.name: Dual Wield Speed Focus
dualWieldSpeedFocus.description: Your training focuses on overwhelming speed with two weapons, granting a large bonus to attack speed.

speedMasteryDual.name: Speed Mastery (Dual)
speedMasteryDual.description: Your movements are a blur, increasing both movement speed and attack speed.

lightningStrikes.name: Lightning Strikes
lightningStrikes.description: Your attacks are as fast as lightning, granting a chance to strike an additional time.

flowingCombat.name: Flowing Combat
flowingCombat.description: You flow from one attack to the next. After killing an enemy, your next attack costs no stamina.

dualWieldBleedFocus.name: Dual Wield Bleed Focus
dualWieldBleedFocus.description: Your dual-wielding style is optimized to create deep, bleeding wounds.

bleedMasteryDual.name: Bleed Mastery (Dual)
bleedMasteryDual.description: Your understanding of anatomy allows your bleed effects to be more agonizing and last longer.

viciousEdges.name: Vicious Edges
viciousEdges.description: Your blades are exceptionally sharp, increasing their base damage and the potency of your bleed effects.

sanguineDance.name: Sanguine Dance
sanguineDance.description: The sight of blood fuels your dance of death. You gain a stacking attack speed buff for each unique enemy that is bleeding.

dualWieldPoisonFocus.name: Dual Wield Poison Focus
dualWieldPoisonFocus.description: You are adept at applying poisons with both weapons, increasing the chance and allowing poisons to stack higher.

poisonExpertiseDual.name: Poison Expertise (Dual)
poisonExpertiseDual.description: Your expertise with poisons makes them more damaging and harder to resist.

effects.description: Targets you poison have their Poison Resistance reduced.

toxicMastery.name: Toxic Mastery
toxicMastery.description: You can mix toxins to create debilitating effects. Your poisons have a chance to also slow or weaken the target.

lingeringToxins.name: Lingering Toxins
lingeringToxins.description: Your poisons linger in the victim's system, extending their duration.

dualWieldEvasionFocus.name: Dual Wield Evasion Focus
dualWieldEvasionFocus.description: Using two weapons defensively allows for a fluid, evasive fighting style, increasing your dodge and parry chance.

evasionMasteryDual.name: Evasion Mastery (Dual)
evasionMasteryDual.description: Your mastery of evasion is unparalleled. Successfully dodging an attack grants a temporary boost to your attack speed.

shadowmeldTechnique.name: Shadowmeld Technique
shadowmeldTechnique.description: You can briefly meld with the shadows after a successful parry, making your next attack a guaranteed critical hit.

predictiveDefense.name: Predictive Defense
predictiveDefense.description: Your ability to predict enemy movements reduces the accuracy of all attacks made against you.

effects.description: All enemies attacking you have their accuracy reduced by 5.

berserkFocus.name: Berserk Focus
berserkFocus.description: Your rage is a finely honed weapon. Increases damage dealt while under any Berserk or Rage effect.

effects.description: Deal 15% more damage while enraged.

oneHandedBerserk.name: One-Handed Berserk
oneHandedBerserk.description: Wielding a single weapon allows for more ferocious, unrestrained attacks, increasing your attack speed.

unyieldingFury.name: Unyielding Fury
unyieldingFury.description: Your fury makes you difficult to stop. You gain increased resistance to stuns and slows.

adrenalRush.name: Adrenal Rush
adrenalRush.description: When you fall below 30% health, you get a rush of adrenaline, massively increasing your stamina regeneration for a short time.

durabilityFocus.name: Durability Focus
durabilityFocus.description: Your focus on survival has hardened your body, increasing your maximum health and armor.

oneHandedDurability.name: One-Handed Durability
oneHandedDurability.description: Wielding a single weapon leaves you more mobile and aware, increasing your dodge and block chance.

ironcladPhysique.name: Ironclad Physique
ironcladPhysique.description: Your body is like iron, granting you a natural resistance to physical damage.

painTolerance.name: Pain Tolerance
painTolerance.description: You've grown accustomed to pain, reducing the duration of bleed and burn effects on you.

effects.description: Reduces duration of Bleed and Burn effects on self by 25%.

singleTargetFocus.name: Single-Target Focus
singleTargetFocus.description: You excel at focusing on a single opponent, increasing all damage dealt to your primary target.

effects.description: Increases damage to single targets.

oneHandedExecutioner.name: One-Handed Executioner
oneHandedExecutioner.description: Your one-handed style is built for finishing blows. Your attacks against low-health enemies deal significantly more damage.

anatomyKnowledge.name: Anatomy Knowledge
anatomyKnowledge.description: Your knowledge of anatomy increases your critical hit damage.

killerInstinct.name: Killer Instinct
killerInstinct.description: Your killer instinct grants you a burst of speed after felling an opponent.

powerFocus.name: Power Focus
powerFocus.description: Your fighting style is all about raw power, granting a permanent bonus to your Strength.

oneHandedPower.name: One-Handed Power
oneHandedPower.description: Wielding a one-handed weapon with both hands for a strike allows for immense power, increasing damage dealt.

immenseStrength.name: Immense Strength
immenseStrength.description: Your immense strength allows your attacks to have a chance to stun weaker foes.

bruteForce.name: Brute Force
bruteForce.description: You rely on brute force, ignoring a portion of enemy armor with all your melee attacks.

speedFocusOneHand.name: One-Handed Speed Focus
speedFocusOneHand.description: Your focus on speed grants you increased attack speed and lower stamina costs for your abilities.

oneHandedSpeed.name: One-Handed Speed
oneHandedSpeed.description: Wielding a single weapon allows for unmatched agility and speed.

lightningReflexesWarrior.name: Lightning Reflexes (Warrior)
lightningReflexesWarrior.description: Your reflexes are so sharp that after dodging, your next attack is significantly faster.

agileFighter.name: Agile Fighter
agileFighter.description: Your agility in combat makes you harder to hit, permanently increasing your dodge chance.

rallyFocus.name: Rally Focus
rallyFocus.description: Your rallying cries are more potent, increasing the duration of all your Rally effects.

oneHandedTactician.name: One-Handed Tactician
oneHandedTactician.description: Your tactical mind allows you to get more out of a one-handed fighting style, increasing accuracy and the effectiveness of your commands.

charismaticLeader.name: Charismatic Leader
charismaticLeader.description: Your charisma inspires loyalty and courage, granting nearby allies a permanent bonus to their vitality.

masterStrategist.name: Master Strategist
masterStrategist.description: You can see the flow of battle, granting you a chance to act first in combat and reducing the cooldown of your tactical abilities.

shieldDurabilityFocus.name: Shield Durability Focus
shieldDurabilityFocus.description: Your focus on defense makes your shield an extension of your body, greatly increasing your block chance.

oneHandedShieldDurability.name: One-Handed & Shield Durability
oneHandedShieldDurability.description: The one-handed weapon and shield style is the pinnacle of defense. You gain a massive bonus to armor.

masterOfDefense.name: Master of Defense
masterOfDefense.description: You are a master of defense, reducing all incoming damage by a flat amount.

immovableObject.name: Immovable Object
immovableObject.description: You are an immovable object on the battlefield, immune to knockback and knockdown effects.

shieldSingleTargetFocus.name: Shielded Single-Target Focus
shieldSingleTargetFocus.description: Your shield provides a stable base for powerful, focused attacks against a single foe.

oneHandedShieldBreaker.name: One-Handed & Shield Breaker
oneHandedShieldBreaker.description: Your shield bashes are exceptionally good at breaking through enemy defenses, ignoring armor.

focusedAggression.name: Focused Aggression
focusedAggression.description: When you successfully block an attack, you enter a state of focused aggression, increasing your damage and accuracy for a short time.

unstoppableAssault.name: Unstoppable Assault
unstoppableAssault.description: Your relentless assault makes it difficult for enemies to mount a proper defense, reducing their block and parry chance.

shieldMultiTargetFocus.name: Shielded Multi-Target Focus
shieldMultiTargetFocus.description: You are skilled at using your shield to control and damage multiple opponents at once.

oneHandedShieldStorm.name: One-Handed & Shield Storm
oneHandedShieldStorm.description: Your sweeping attacks with your weapon and shield have a chance to daze opponents.

crowdControlMastery.name: Crowd Control Mastery
crowdControlMastery.description: You are a master of controlling the battlefield, increasing the duration of your stun and knockdown effects.

indomitablePresence.name: Indomitable Presence
indomitablePresence.description: Your presence on the front line is indomitable, slowing nearby enemies.

shieldPowerFocus.name: Shielded Power Focus
shieldPowerFocus.description: You channel immense strength into your attacks, leveraging your shield for stability.

oneHandedShieldPower.name: One-Handed & Shield Power
oneHandedShieldPower.description: The perfect balance of offense and defense grants a significant damage bonus to your one-handed weapon attacks.

mightyGuardian.name: Mighty Guardian
mightyGuardian.description: Your mighty physique makes you more resilient. Increases Vitality.

unwaveringCommander.name: Unwavering Commander
unwaveringCommander.description: As a commander, your resolve is unwavering. You are immune to fear.

shieldSpeedFocus.name: Shielded Speed Focus
shieldSpeedFocus.description: Your focus on speed allows you to react faster with your shield, increasing block and dodge.

oneHandedShieldSpeed.name: One-Handed & Shield Speed
oneHandedShieldSpeed.description: You move with surprising speed for a shielded warrior, increasing your movement and attack speed.

agileGuardian.name: Agile Guardian
agileGuardian.description: Your agility allows you to reposition after blocking an attack, gaining a short burst of speed.

lightningReflexesShield.name: Lightning Reflexes (Shield)
lightningReflexesShield.description: Your reflexes are so sharp that you can sometimes block an attack that would have otherwise hit.

effects.description: 10% chance to block attacks that are normally unblockable.

shieldRallyFocus.name: Shielded Rally Focus
shieldRallyFocus.description: Your rallying cries are more effective when you are defending, increasing their power.

oneHandedShieldMarshal.name: One-Handed & Shield Marshal
oneHandedShieldMarshal.description: As a marshal, your presence is a boon to your allies, increasing their armor.

inspiringPresence.name: Inspiring Presence
inspiringPresence.description: Your inspiring presence causes allies to fight harder, granting them bonus damage.

tacticalGenius.name: Tactical Genius
tacticalGenius.description: Your tactical genius allows you to identify and call out weaknesses, reducing enemy armor near you.

effectOnEnemies.description: Nearby enemies have their armor reduced by 10%.

berserkMastery.name: Berserker Mastery
berserkMastery.description: You have mastered the art of rage, increasing the damage and duration of your Berserk effects.

twoHandedBerserk.name: Two-Handed Berserk
twoHandedBerserk.description: Wielding a two-handed weapon fuels your rage, granting bonus damage.

unstoppableMight.name: Unstoppable Might
unstoppableMight.description: When enraged, your might is unstoppable. Your attacks ignore a portion of enemy armor.

boundlessRage.name: Boundless Rage
boundlessRage.description: Your rage knows no bounds. Killing an enemy while enraged extends the duration of your rage.

durabilityMasteryTwoHand.name: Two-Handed Durability Mastery
durabilityMasteryTwoHand.description: You have mastered the art of using your large weapon to deflect blows, increasing your armor.

twoHandedDurability.name: Two-Handed Durability
twoHandedDurability.description: Your two-handed fighting style is surprisingly defensive, granting you a bonus to block chance.

colossalMight.name: Colossal Might
colossalMight.description: Your colossal might increases your Strength and Vitality.

ironResolve.name: Iron Resolve
ironResolve.description: Your resolve is like iron, making you highly resistant to control effects.

effects.description: +25% resistance to all control effects.

singleTargetMasteryTwoHand.name: Two-Handed Single-Target Mastery
singleTargetMasteryTwoHand.description: You are a master of felling single, powerful foes with your greatweapon.

twoHandedExecutioner.name: Two-Handed Executioner
twoHandedExecutioner.description: Your two-handed weapon is an instrument of execution, dealing bonus damage to low-health targets.

precisionPower.name: Precision Power
precisionPower.description: You combine power with precision, increasing your critical hit chance with two-handed weapons.

lethalFocus.name: Lethal Focus
lethalFocus.description: Your focus is lethal. After a short time without taking damage, your next attack deals significantly more damage.

multiTargetMasteryTwoHand.name: Two-Handed Multi-Target Mastery
multiTargetMasteryTwoHand.description: You are a master of cleaving through hordes of enemies with your greatweapon.

twoHandedReaper.name: Two-Handed Reaper
twoHandedReaper.description: Your sweeping attacks with your two-handed weapon have a chance to inflict bleeding wounds.

wideSwings.name: Wide Swings
wideSwings.description: Your swings are exceptionally wide, allowing your cleaving attacks to hit an additional target.

terrifyingMight.name: Terrifying Might
terrifyingMight.description: Your mighty presence terrifies foes, reducing their damage output when they are near you.

powerMasteryTwoHand.name: Two-Handed Power Mastery
powerMasteryTwoHand.description: You have mastered the art of putting all your might into your two-handed weapon strikes.

twoHandedTitan.name: Two-Handed Titan
twoHandedTitan.description: Your strength is titanic, granting a large bonus to your Strength stat.

tremendousForce.name: Tremendous Force
tremendousForce.description: The force of your blows is tremendous, giving all your two-handed attacks a chance to stun.

earthShakingPresence.name: Earth-Shaking Presence
earthShakingPresence.description: Your every step shakes the earth, creating a minor tremor that slows enemies around you.

rallyMasteryTwoHand.name: Two-Handed Rally Mastery
rallyMasteryTwoHand.description: Your mastery of two-handed combat inspires your allies, increasing the power of your Rally effects.

twoHandedCaptain.name: Two-Handed Captain
twoHandedCaptain.description: As a captain wielding a greatweapon, your offensive presence is a boon to your allies, increasing their damage.

auraOfCommand.name: Aura of Command
auraOfCommand.description: Your commanding aura bolsters allies' resolve, granting them increased Vitality.

strategicMind.name: Strategic Mind
strategicMind.description: Your strategic mind finds weaknesses in enemy formations, allowing your allies' attacks to ignore a portion of enemy armor.

effectOnAllies.description: Nearby allies' attacks ignore 10% of enemy armor.

lavaAffinity.name: Lava Affinity
lavaAffinity.description: Your affinity for molten rock grants you immense resistance to fire and heat.

enhancedFireEarth.name: Enhanced Fire & Earth
enhancedFireEarth.description: Your command over both fire and earth is enhanced, increasing the damage of both spell types.

earthfireConduit.name: Earthfire Conduit
earthfireConduit.description: You act as a conduit for earth and fire. Casting an Earth spell empowers your next Fire spell, and vice-versa.

heartOfMagma.name: Heart of Magma
heartOfMagma.description: Your heart is a core of magma. When you fall below 30% health, you erupt, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies.

fireStoneFocus.name: Fire & Stone Focus
fireStoneFocus.description: Your focus on the union of fire and stone enhances your power and control.

geomancyPyromancySynergy.name: Geomancy-Pyromancy Synergy
geomancyPyromancySynergy.description: Your Earth spells increase the burn duration of your Fire spells, and your Fire spells increase the stun chance of your Earth spells.

obsidianForm.name: Obsidian Form
obsidianForm.description: Your skin can take on the properties of obsidian, granting you high damage reduction when you stand still.

heartOfStoneAndFire.name: Heart of Stone and Fire
heartOfStoneAndFire.description: Your very being is a fusion of stone and fire. Melee attackers take fire damage, and you are resistant to physical slows.

thermalMastery.name: Thermal Mastery
thermalMastery.description: Your mastery over temperature extremes increases the damage of both Fire and Ice spells.

fireIceSynergy.name: Fire-Ice Synergy
fireIceSynergy.description: Your Fire spells make enemies more vulnerable to Ice, and your Ice spells make them more vulnerable to Fire.

elementalBalance.name: Elemental Balance
elementalBalance.description: Alternating between Fire and Ice spells empowers your magic. Each alternation grants a stacking bonus to Magic Power.

masterOfTemperatures.name: Master of Temperatures
masterOfTemperatures.description: You are a master of extreme temperatures, granting you resistance to both Fire and Ice.

wildfireDruidFocus.name: Wildfire Druid Focus
wildfireDruidFocus.description: Your focus on the destructive and renewing cycle of nature and fire enhances your magic.

fireNatureSynergy.name: Fire-Nature Synergy
fireNatureSynergy.description: Your Fire spells have a chance to also entangle foes, and your Nature spells can ignite enemies.

primordialAttunement.name: Primordial Attunement
primordialAttunement.description: You are attuned to the primordial forces of creation and destruction, granting you mana regeneration.

aspectOfThePhoenix.name: Aspect of the Phoenix
aspectOfThePhoenix.description: Embodying the phoenix, you have a chance to be reborn upon death with a portion of your health, releasing a fiery explosion.

fireLifestealFocus.name: Fire Lifesteal Focus
fireLifestealFocus.description: You specialize in fire magic that drains life, increasing the effectiveness of your lifesteal.

effects.description: Increases the amount of health gained from lifesteal effects by 20%.

phoenixAffinity.name: Phoenix Affinity
phoenixAffinity.description: Your affinity with the phoenix grants you great resistance to fire and causes your healing spells to also grant a minor fire resistance buff.

vitalityFromAshes.name: Vitality from Ashes
vitalityFromAshes.description: When an enemy dies while burning from one of your effects, you are healed for a small amount.

eternalFlame.name: Eternal Flame
eternalFlame.description: Your fire is eternal. Your burn effects have a chance to refresh their duration each time they deal damage.

effects.description: 15% chance for your Burns to refresh their duration on tick.

stonechargedSynergy.name: Stonecharged Synergy
stonechargedSynergy.description: Your Earth spells cause enemies to become statically charged, taking damage the next time they are hit by a lightning spell. Your Lightning spells can petrify enemies for a short duration.

masterOfChargedEarth.name: Master of Charged Earth
masterOfChargedEarth.description: You are a master of imbuing earth with lightning. Your summoned Earth/Stone minions have a lightning aura that periodically damages nearby enemies.

geomagneticPower.name: Geomagnetic Power
geomagneticPower.description: Your connection to the earth's magnetic field increases your Magic Power.

hydrothermalMastery.name: Hydrothermal Mastery
hydrothermalMastery.description: Your mastery over water and heat increases the damage of your Steam spells and makes them more likely to scald opponents.

mysticFlow.name: Mystic Flow
mysticFlow.description: You move with the flow of steam and water, increasing your dodge chance. Successfully dodging an attack restores some mana.

vaporWeaving.name: Vapor Weaving
vaporWeaving.description: Your steam and mist spells are more potent and harder to see through, increasing their damage and debuff effectiveness.

effects.description: Increases damage and debuff power of mist/steam skills by 15%.

airNecromancySynergy.name: Air-Necromancy Synergy
airNecromancySynergy.description: Your Air spells can carry necrotic curses, and your Necromancy spells can be hastened by the wind, reducing their cast time.

masterOfTheDeadWinds.name: Master of the Dead Winds
masterOfTheDeadWinds.description: Your undead minions are infused with the chill of the grave wind, slowing enemies they attack.

etherealForm.name: Ethereal Form
etherealForm.description: Your form is partially ethereal, granting you a permanent chance to dodge attacks.

elementalistSummonerSynergy.name: Elementalist-Summoner Synergy
elementalistSummonerSynergy.description: Your elemental spells empower your summoned elementals of the same type.

masterOfElements.name: Master of Elements
masterOfElements.description: Your mastery over the elements grants you increased resistance to all elemental damage.

conduitOfTheWilds.name: Conduit of the Wilds
conduitOfTheWilds.description: You are a conduit for primal energies, increasing your mana regeneration for each active elemental.

sanguineArcanaSynergy.name: Sanguine Arcana Synergy
sanguineArcanaSynergy.description: Your Blood Magic spells restore some mana, and your Arcane spells heal you for a small portion of the damage they deal.

masterOfForbiddenArts.name: Master of Forbidden Arts
masterOfForbiddenArts.description: Your mastery of forbidden arts allows you to sacrifice less health for your blood magic.

hemomancy.name: Hemomancy
hemomancy.description: Your damaging spells have a chance to inflict a bleeding wound on the target.

earthStoneSynergy.name: Earth-Stone Synergy
earthStoneSynergy.description: Your Earth spells grant you a temporary shield of stone. Your Stone spells have increased damage.

unyieldingEarth.name: Unyielding Earth
unyieldingEarth.description: The earth itself protects you, granting a large bonus to your armor.

heartOfTheMountain.name: Heart of the Mountain
heartOfTheMountain.description: You possess the heart of a mountain, granting you immense vitality and health regeneration.

permafrostSynergy.name: Permafrost Synergy
permafrostSynergy.description: Your Ice spells have a chance to root enemies, and your Earth spells deal bonus damage to frozen or chilled targets.

masterOfFrozenEarth.name: Master of Frozen Earth
masterOfFrozenEarth.description: Your mastery over frozen earth allows you to summon more durable ice and earth elementals.

glacialHeart.name: Glacial Heart
glacialHeart.description: Your heart is like a glacier, chilling melee attackers and making you resistant to fire.

thermalVentSynergy.name: Thermal Vent Synergy
thermalVentSynergy.description: Your Steam spells leave behind a patch of hot ground that deals fire damage. Your Earth spells are more effective on scalded targets.

masterOfScaldingEarth.name: Master of Scalding Earth
masterOfScaldingEarth.description: You are a master of scalding earth, increasing the duration and damage of your steam and burn effects.

wardenOfTheVents.name: Warden of the Vents
wardenOfTheVents.description: As a warden of geothermal vents, you have high resistance to Earth and Fire damage.

runicGeomancy.name: Runic Geomancy
runicGeomancy.description: Your Earth spells can leave behind minor runes that detonate for a small amount of damage after a delay.

masterRunecarverEarth.name: Master Runecarver (Earth)
masterRunecarverEarth.description: Your skill in carving earth runes allows them to arm faster and have a larger area of effect.

ancientTerraKnowledge.name: Ancient Terra Knowledge
ancientTerraKnowledge.description: Your knowledge of ancient earth runes allows your Earth spells to partially bypass resistances and for your Rune effects to last longer.

sanguineGeomancySynergy.name: Sanguine Geomancy Synergy
sanguineGeomancySynergy.description: Your Earth spells have a chance to cause bleeding. Your Blood Magic is empowered when you are below 50% health.

masterOfBloodAndStone.name: Master of Blood and Stone
masterOfBloodAndStone.description: You are a master of blood and stone. Your summoned earth/blood minions are more powerful.

earthDrinker.name: Earth Drinker
earthDrinker.description: You can drink the very essence of the earth, healing you over time while you are in contact with the ground.

gravedirtShamanism.name: Gravedirt Shamanism
gravedirtShamanism.description: Your shamanistic connection to graveyards enhances your Necromancy spells, increasing their power.

masterOfEarthenDead.name: Master of the Earthen Dead
masterOfEarthenDead.description: Your mastery over the earthen dead allows you to summon more durable and powerful undead minions from the ground.

spiritOfTheWastes.name: Spirit of the Wastes
spiritOfTheWastes.description: You are one with the wastes, granting you resistance to poison and disease.

verdantEarthSynergy.name: Verdant Earth Synergy
verdantEarthSynergy.description: Your Earth spells have a chance to also heal a nearby ally. Your Nature spells have a chance to grant a temporary armor buff.

masterOfLivingStone.name: Master of Living Stone
masterOfLivingStone.description: Your mastery of living stone makes your earth and nature minions more resilient.

wardenOfTheWildsAndEarth.name: Warden of the Wilds and Earth
wardenOfTheWildsAndEarth.description: As a warden of both wilds and earth, you gain a constant, slow health regeneration.

geodeSynergy.name: Geode Synergy
geodeSynergy.description: Your Earth spells have a chance to create a geode on the battlefield. Picking it up restores mana.

masterOfEarthlyDrain.name: Master of Earthly Drain
masterOfEarthlyDrain.description: Your mastery of draining earth's essence increases the healing from your lifesteal effects.

siphonerOfTheDeep.name: Siphoner of the Deep
siphonerOfTheDeep.description: You can siphon life from the very bedrock, gaining health regeneration when below 50% health.

tidalScoldingSynergy.name: Tidal Scolding Synergy
tidalScoldingSynergy.description: Your Water spells have a chance to scald enemies, dealing fire damage over time. Your Fire spells are more effective on Drenched targets.

masterOfHydrothermalFury.name: Master of Hydrothermal Fury
masterOfHydrothermalFury.description: Your mastery over water and heat increases the power of your Steam, Fire, and Water spells.

scaldLord.name: Scald Lord
scaldLord.description: You are the lord of scalds. Your burn effects also reduce the target's armor.

aquaticGeomancy.name: Aquatic Geomancy
aquaticGeomancy.description: Your Earth spells have a chance to also Drench targets, and your Water spells can create small stone barriers.

masterOfSiltAndStone.name: Master of Silt and Stone
masterOfSiltAndStone.description: Your control over silt and stone is masterful, increasing the duration of your root and slow effects.

heartOfTheRiverbed.name: Heart of the Riverbed
heartOfTheRiverbed.description: The riverbed is your heart, granting you increased armor and health regeneration when you are near water or have used a water spell recently.

glacialMastery.name: Glacial Mastery
glacialMastery.description: Your mastery over ice makes your freeze and chill effects last longer and harder to resist.

masterOfFrozenWaters.name: Master of Frozen Waters
masterOfFrozenWaters.description: Your mastery over frozen water increases the damage of your Ice and Water spells.

heartOfWinter.name: Heart of Winter
heartOfWinter.description: Your heart is like the endless winter, chilling melee attackers and making you more resilient to cold.

maelstromConduitSynergy.name: Maelstrom Conduit Synergy
maelstromConduitSynergy.description: Your Water spells have a chance to call down a lightning strike. Your Lightning spells are more effective on Drenched targets.

masterOfTheChargedDeep.name: Master of the Charged Deep
masterOfTheChargedDeep.description: Your mastery over the charged deep increases the power and stun chance of your lightning spells.

eyeOfTheStorm.name: Eye of the Storm
eyeOfTheStorm.description: You are the calm eye of the storm, granting you damage reduction and mana regeneration while you have an active storm-like effect.

runicHydromancy.name: Runic Hydromancy
runicHydromancy.description: Your Water spells can leave behind minor runes that detonate for a small amount of healing to a nearby ally.

masterRunecarverWater.name: Master Runecarver (Water)
masterRunecarverWater.description: Your skill in carving water runes allows them to arm faster and have a larger area of effect.

ancientAquaKnowledge.name: Ancient Aqua Knowledge
ancientAquaKnowledge.description: Your knowledge of ancient water runes allows your Water spells to more effectively slow enemies and your Rune effects to last longer.

sanguineHydromancy.name: Sanguine Hydromancy
sanguineHydromancy.description: Your Water spells have a chance to drain life from the target. Your Blood Magic is empowered when you are near water.

masterOfBloodTides.name: Master of Blood Tides
masterOfBloodTides.description: Your mastery over blood tides allows you to summon more powerful and durable blood minions.

deepDweller.name: Deep Dweller
deepDweller.description: You are at home in the deep, granting you resistance to pressure and cold.

drownedSoulSynergy.name: Drowned Soul Synergy
drownedSoulSynergy.description: Your Water spells have a chance to fear enemies. Your Necromancy spells are more effective on Drenched targets.

masterOfTheSunkenDead.name: Master of the Sunken Dead
masterOfTheSunkenDead.description: Your mastery over the drowned dead makes your undead minions more resilient and grants them a watery shield.

callerOfTheAbyss.name: Caller of the Abyss
callerOfTheAbyss.description: Your connection to the abyss grants you increased Magic Power and resistance to Shadow damage.

coralWhisperingSynergy.name: Coral Whispering Synergy
coralWhisperingSynergy.description: Your Water spells have a chance to create a patch of healing coral. Your Nature spells are more effective when cast near water or coral.

masterOfAquaticLife.name: Master of Aquatic Life
masterOfAquaticLife.description: Your mastery over aquatic life allows you to summon more powerful and varied sea creatures.

voiceOfTheDeep.name: Voice of the Deep
voiceOfTheDeep.description: The voice of the deep resonates within you, causing your healing spells to also restore a small amount of mana.

tidalLeechSynergy.name: Tidal Leech Synergy
tidalLeechSynergy.description: Your Water spells have a chance to apply a leeching debuff, healing you when the target takes damage from any source.

masterOfAquaticDrain.name: Master of Aquatic Drain
masterOfAquaticDrain.description: Your mastery of aquatic draining increases the amount of health and mana you siphon.

livingMaelstromForm.name: Living Maelstrom Form
livingMaelstromForm.description: You can transform into a living maelstrom of siphoning water, constantly draining life from nearby enemies.

cinderstormSynergy.name: Cinderstorm Synergy
cinderstormSynergy.description: Your Fire spells have a chance to create a small cyclone. Your Air spells can carry embers, dealing bonus fire damage.

masterOfBurningWinds.name: Master of Burning Winds
masterOfBurningWinds.description: Your mastery over burning winds increases the damage and control effects of your Fire and Air spells.

zephyrOfTheInferno.name: Zephyr of the Inferno
zephyrOfTheInferno.description: You move with the speed of an inferno's updraft, granting you increased dodge and movement speed.

sandstormSculpting.name: Sandstorm Sculpting
sandstormSculpting.description: Your sandstorms are more abrasive and disorienting, dealing more damage and further reducing enemy accuracy.

effects.description: Increases Sandstorm damage and accuracy reduction by 25%.

masterOfDesertWinds.name: Master of Desert Winds
masterOfDesertWinds.description: Your mastery over desert winds grants your Air spells a chance to blind enemies with sand.

heartOfTheDunes.name: Heart of the Dunes
heartOfTheDunes.description: Your heart is one with the dunes, granting you resistance to physical damage and heat.

hoarfrostTempestSynergy.name: Hoarfrost Tempest Synergy
hoarfrostTempestSynergy.description: Your Ice spells have a chance to create a gust of wind, pushing enemies back. Your Air spells are more effective on chilled or frozen targets.

masterOfWinterStorms.name: Master of Winter Storms
masterOfWinterStorms.description: Your mastery over winter storms increases the duration and slowing effect of your chill and freeze effects.

icyVeins.name: Icy Veins
icyVeins.description: Your veins run with frost, chilling melee attackers and reducing the mana cost of your Ice spells.

stormcallerSynergy.name: Stormcaller Synergy
stormcallerSynergy.description: Your Lightning spells have a chance to create a small cyclone. Your Air spells can call down a bolt of lightning.

masterOfStorms.name: Master of Storms
masterOfStorms.description: Your mastery over storms increases the damage and area of effect of your Air and Lightning spells.

avatarOfSkywrath.name: Avatar of Skywrath
avatarOfSkywrath.description: You are the avatar of the sky's wrath, granting you flight and increased lightning resistance.

mistralVaporSynergy.name: Mistral-Vapor Synergy
mistralVaporSynergy.description: Your Steam spells have a chance to create a disorienting gust of wind. Your Air spells are more effective inside your mists.

masterOfVaporsAndWinds.name: Master of Vapors and Winds
masterOfVaporsAndWinds.description: Your mastery over vapors and winds increases the duration of your mist effects and the speed of your wind spells.

formOfTheMistral.name: Form of the Mistral
formOfTheMistral.description: Your form is like the mistral wind, granting you increased dodge chance and resistance to Air damage.

runicAeromancy.name: Runic Aeromancy
runicAeromancy.description: Your Air spells can leave behind minor runes that create a small gust of wind when stepped on.

masterRunecarverAir.name: Master Runecarver (Air)
masterRunecarverAir.description: Your skill in carving air and lightning runes allows them to arm faster and have a larger area of effect.

ancientSkyKnowledge.name: Ancient Sky Knowledge
ancientSkyKnowledge.description: Your knowledge of ancient sky runes allows your Air and Lightning spells to partially bypass resistances and for your Rune effects to last longer.

sanguineAeromancy.name: Sanguine Aeromancy
sanguineAeromancy.description: Your Air spells have a chance to drain life from the target. Your Blood Magic is empowered when you have a speed buff.

masterOfBloodWinds.name: Master of Blood Winds
masterOfBloodWinds.description: Your mastery over blood winds increases the damage and lifesteal effectiveness of your blood and air spells.

tempestariiLord.name: Tempestarii Lord
tempestariiLord.description: As a lord of the sanguine tempest, you are resistant to shadow damage and your speed cannot be reduced below its base value.

skySylphSynergy.name: Sky-Sylph Synergy
skySylphSynergy.description: Your Air spells have a chance to summon a lesser wisp that heals a nearby ally. Your Nature spells are more effective when you have an active air or nature minion.

masterOfAerialLife.name: Master of Aerial Life
masterOfAerialLife.description: Your mastery over aerial life allows your summoned air and nature minions to be more potent.

voiceOfTheSky.name: Voice of the Sky
voiceOfTheSky.description: The voice of the sky whispers to you, granting you a constant, slow mana regeneration.

zephyrLeechSynergy.name: Zephyr Leech Synergy
zephyrLeechSynergy.description: Your Air spells have a chance to weaken the target, increasing the lifesteal you gain from them. Successfully draining a foe's life empowers your next Air spell.

masterOfAerialDrain.name: Master of Aerial Drain
masterOfAerialDrain.description: Your mastery over aerial draining increases the damage and effectiveness of your lifestealing Air spells.

soulDevouringGaleForm.name: Soul-Devouring Gale Form
soulDevouringGaleForm.description: Your very form is a soul-devouring gale, granting you lifesteal on all your damaging spells.

necromancySummonerSynergy.name: Necromancy-Summoner Synergy
necromancySummonerSynergy.description: Your necromantic spells empower your undead minions. Each time you cast a Necromancy spell, your minions gain a temporary damage boost.

masterOfUndeadLegions.name: Master of Undead Legions
masterOfUndeadLegions.description: You are a master of undead legions, allowing you to have one additional skeleton summoned at all times.

lichKingAura.name: Lich King's Aura
lichKingAura.description: You exude the aura of a lich king, granting all nearby undead minions increased armor and magic resistance.

natureSummonerSynergy.name: Nature-Summoner Synergy
natureSummonerSynergy.description: Your Nature spells heal your summoned minions for a portion of their damage.

masterOfTheWildCall.name: Master of the Wild Call
masterOfTheWildCall.description: Your mastery of the wild call allows you to summon more powerful and varied beasts.

voiceOfTheWilderness.name: Voice of the Wilderness
voiceOfTheWilderness.description: The voice of the wilderness speaks through you, causing your summoned beasts to have increased health regeneration.

sanguineConjuration.name: Sanguine Conjuration
sanguineConjuration.description: Your blood magic strengthens your summons. Each time you cast a Blood Magic spell, your minions are healed.

masterOfBloodPacts.name: Master of Blood Pacts
masterOfBloodPacts.description: Your mastery of blood pacts increases the health and damage of your summoned blood minions.

forbiddenSummons.name: Forbidden Summons
forbiddenSummons.description: You delve into forbidden summoning, allowing your blood minions to have a chance to inflict fear on hit.

arcaneMagmaSynergy.name: Arcane-Magma Synergy
arcaneMagmaSynergy.description: Your Fire spells have a chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Arcane spell. Your Arcane spells increase the damage of your next Fire spell.

masterOfUnstableEarth.name: Master of Unstable Earth
masterOfUnstableEarth.description: Your mastery over unstable earth makes your lava and magma spells more volatile and damaging.

heartOfArcaneVolcano.name: Heart of the Arcane Volcano
heartOfArcaneVolcano.description: You are the heart of an arcane volcano, granting you immense fire resistance and causing your spells to have a chance to erupt for bonus arcane damage.

aethericGeomancy.name: Aetheric Geomancy
aethericGeomancy.description: Your Earth spells have a chance to restore some of your mana. Your Arcane spells have a chance to create a small stone shield on you.

masterOfCrystallineForms.name: Master of Crystalline Forms
masterOfCrystallineForms.description: Your mastery over crystalline forms increases the duration and power of your stone walls and constructs.

leylineAttunement.name: Leyline Attunement
leylineAttunement.description: Your attunement to the leylines grants you a permanent boost to your magic control and mana pool.

cryoArcanaSynergy.name: Cryo-Arcana Synergy
cryoArcanaSynergy.description: Your Ice spells have a chance to restore a small amount of mana. Your Arcane spells have a chance to chill the target.

masterOfFrozenTime.name: Master of Frozen Time
masterOfFrozenTime.description: Your mastery over frozen time increases the duration of your freeze and stasis effects.

icyIntellect.name: Icy Intellect
icyIntellect.description: Your intellect is as sharp as ice, granting you increased critical hit chance with your spells.

electroArcanaSynergy.name: Electro-Arcana Synergy
electroArcanaSynergy.description: Your Lightning spells have a chance to burn the target's mana. Your Arcane spells are more effective on targets with less than 50% mana.

masterOfChargedMana.name: Master of Charged Mana
masterOfChargedMana.description: Your mastery over charged mana increases the damage of your lightning spells and the effectiveness of your mana-draining abilities.

archonForm.name: Archon Form
archonForm.description: You can briefly take on the form of an archon of pure energy, becoming immune to silence and gaining immense mana regeneration.

aethericGeyserSynergy.name: Aetheric Geyser Synergy
aethericGeyserSynergy.description: Your Steam spells have a chance to leave behind a pool of arcane energy that restores mana to allies. Your Arcane spells deal bonus damage to scalded targets.

masterOfManaVapors.name: Master of Mana Vapors
masterOfManaVapors.description: Your mastery over mana-infused vapors increases the mana drain and silence duration of your abilities.

geyserlordForm.name: Geyserlord Form
geyserlordForm.description: You can take on the form of a geyserlord, granting you immunity to being rooted or slowed and increasing your water resistance.

runicArcana.name: Runic Arcana
runicArcana.description: Your Arcane spells have a chance to automatically inscribe a minor arcane rune on the target, which detonates after a short delay.

masterGlyptographer.name: Master Glyptographer
masterGlyptographer.description: Your mastery over glyphs increases the power and duration of all your rune and glyph effects.

ancientArcaneKnowledge.name: Ancient Arcane Knowledge
ancientArcaneKnowledge.description: Your study of ancient glyphs allows your Arcane spells to partially bypass magic resistance.

umbralArcanaSynergy.name: Umbral Arcana Synergy
umbralArcanaSynergy.description: Your Arcane spells have a chance to apply a shadow curse. Your Necromancy spells can raise a temporary arcane wisp from slain enemies.

masterOfShadowedMagic.name: Master of Shadowed Magic
masterOfShadowedMagic.description: Your mastery of shadowed magic increases the power of your Shadow and Arcane spells.

whispersOfTheVoid.name: Whispers of the Void
whispersOfTheVoid.description: The void whispers to you, granting you increased magic control and resistance to mental effects.

leylineNaturalism.name: Leyline Naturalism
