leylineNaturalism.description: Your Nature spells have a chance to tap into a leyline, restoring mana. Your Arcane spells have a chance to entangle the target.

masterOfArcaneWilds.name: Master of Arcane Wilds
masterOfArcaneWilds.description: Your mastery of the arcane wilds increases the power of your Nature and Arcane healing spells.

voiceOfTheLand.name: Voice of the Land
voiceOfTheLand.description: The land speaks to you, granting you and nearby allies a constant, slow health regeneration.

aethericVampirism.name: Aetheric Vampirism
aethericVampirism.description: Your arcane spells are inherently vampiric, healing you for a small portion of the damage they deal.

masterOfVitalityDrain.name: Master of Vitality Drain
masterOfVitalityDrain.description: Your mastery over vitality drain increases the damage and healing of your lifesteal abilities.

arcaneParasiteForm.name: Arcane Parasite Form
arcaneParasiteForm.description: Your form becomes parasitic. When you fall below 30% health, you begin to drain life from the nearest enemy.

blessedJudicatorSynergy.name: Blessed Judicator Synergy
blessedJudicatorSynergy.description: Your smites have a chance to also apply a minor blessing to yourself. Your blessings have a chance to smite a nearby enemy.

masterOfDivineJustice.name: Master of Divine Justice
masterOfDivineJustice.description: Your mastery over divine justice increases the power of your smites and blessings.

divineWill.name: Divine Will
divineWill.description: Your will is divine, granting you increased magic control and resistance to silence.

sacredChanterSynergy.name: Sacred Chanter Synergy
sacredChanterSynergy.description: Your smites are empowered while you are chanting. Your chants are more potent.

masterOfDivineSong.name: Master of Divine Song
masterOfDivineSong.description: Your mastery of divine song increases the duration of your chant effects.

voiceOfGod.name: Voice of God
voiceOfGod.description: Your voice carries the power of the divine, causing enemies to be periodically weakened just by being near you.

purifyingLightSynergy.name: Purifying Light Synergy
purifyingLightSynergy.description: Your smites have a chance to purge a minor debuff from a nearby ally. Your purge spells have a chance to smite a nearby enemy.

masterOfCleansing.name: Master of Cleansing
masterOfCleansing.description: Your mastery over cleansing magic increases the number of debuffs you can remove with your purge spells.

lightbringerAura.name: Lightbringer's Aura
lightbringerAura.description: You radiate an aura of pure light, granting allies resistance to shadow and necrotic damage.

inquisitorsMight.name: Inquisitor's Might
inquisitorsMight.description: Your might as an inquisitor increases the damage you deal to Undead and Demon enemies.

masterOfExorcism.name: Master of Exorcism
masterOfExorcism.description: Your mastery over exorcism makes your banishment and turning spells more potent and harder to resist.

unyieldingFaithInquisitor.name: Unyielding Faith (Inquisitor)
unyieldingFaithInquisitor.description: Your unyielding faith protects you from the dark arts, granting you high resistance to curses.

soulWardenSynergy.name: Soul Warden Synergy
soulWardenSynergy.description: Your smites have a chance to create a soul link with a nearby ally, briefly sharing a small amount of damage taken. Your soulbinds can pulse with minor holy damage.

masterOfSouls.name: Master of Souls
masterOfSouls.description: Your mastery over souls increases the duration and effectiveness of your soulbind effects.

wardensVigil.name: Warden's Vigil
wardensVigil.description: You keep a constant vigil over the souls of your allies, granting them a permanent bonus to magic resistance.

benevolentHealerSynergy.name: Benevolent Healer Synergy
benevolentHealerSynergy.description: Your healing spells have a chance to also apply a minor blessing. Your blessings also heal for a small amount.

masterOfRestoration.name: Master of Restoration
masterOfRestoration.description: Your mastery over restoration magic increases the power of all your healing spells.

divineGraceHealer.name: Divine Grace (Healer)
divineGraceHealer.description: Your healing spells are imbued with divine grace, granting them a chance to critically heal for a larger amount.

harmonicMenderSynergy.name: Harmonic Mender Synergy
harmonicMenderSynergy.description: Your healing spells are empowered while you are chanting. Your chants are more potent.

masterOfSacredSong.name: Master of Sacred Song
masterOfSacredSong.description: Your mastery of sacred song increases the duration of your chant effects and their area of effect.

voiceOfSerenity.name: Voice of Serenity
voiceOfSerenity.description: Your voice brings serenity, causing allies near you to slowly regenerate mana.

aegisGuardianSynergy.name: Aegis Guardian Synergy
aegisGuardianSynergy.description: Your healing spells have a chance to also grant a small shield. Your shields also provide a small heal over time.

masterOfDivineProtection.name: Master of Divine Protection
masterOfDivineProtection.description: Your mastery over divine protection increases the strength of all your shielding abilities.

unbreakableSpirit.name: Unbreakable Spirit
unbreakableSpirit.description: Your spirit is unbreakable, making your shields more resilient and harder to dispel.

cleansingHandSynergy.name: Cleansing Hand Synergy
cleansingHandSynergy.description: Your healing spells have a chance to also purge a minor debuff. Your purge spells also provide a small heal.

masterOfPurification.name: Master of Purification
masterOfPurification.description: Your mastery over purification makes your dispel effects more likely to succeed against powerful magic.

handOfGod.name: Hand of God
handOfGod.description: Your touch is like the hand of a god, granting your single-target heals a chance to also fully restore the target's stamina.

sanctifiedExorcistSynergy.name: Sanctified Exorcist Synergy
sanctifiedExorcistSynergy.description: Your exorcism spells have a chance to heal a nearby ally. Your healing spells are more effective on allies affected by unholy magic.

masterOfSpiritualCleansing.name: Master of Spiritual Cleansing
masterOfSpiritualCleansing.description: Your mastery over spiritual cleansing increases the effectiveness of all your exorcism and purge spells.

divineProtector.name: Divine Protector
divineProtector.description: You are a divine protector, granting you and nearby allies a permanent bonus to holy resistance.

spiritBinderSynergy.name: Spirit Binder Synergy
spiritBinderSynergy.description: Your healing spells have a chance to create a minor soul link to yourself, healing you for a portion of the amount. Your soulbinds are stronger.

masterOfSoulHealing.name: Master of Soul Healing
masterOfSoulHealing.description: Your mastery over soul healing increases the power of your heal-over-time effects.

channelOfTheAncients.name: Channel of the Ancients
channelOfTheAncients.description: You can channel the wisdom of ancient spirits, granting you increased magic control and mana regeneration.

divineProctorSynergy.name: Divine Proctor Synergy
divineProctorSynergy.description: Your blessings have a chance to also grant a small shield. Your utility spells are cast faster.

masterOfDivineBoons.name: Master of Divine Boons
masterOfDivineBoons.description: Your mastery over divine boons increases the duration of all your blessing and utility buffs.

auraOfBenevolence.name: Aura of Benevolence
auraOfBenevolence.description: You radiate an aura of benevolence, granting all nearby allies a constant, slow heal over time.

holyOratorSynergy.name: Holy Orator Synergy
holyOratorSynergy.description: Your utility spells are empowered while you are chanting. Your chants have a chance to also dispel a minor debuff from allies.

masterOfSacredVerse.name: Master of Sacred Verse
masterOfSacredVerse.description: Your mastery of sacred verses increases the potency and area of effect of your chants.

voiceOfCommand.name: Voice of Command
voiceOfCommand.description: Your voice carries divine authority, making your debuffs harder to resist.

bastionWardenSynergy.name: Bastion Warden Synergy
bastionWardenSynergy.description: Your shields have a chance to also grant a short-duration damage reduction buff. Your utility spells have reduced mana cost.

masterOfDivineWards.name: Master of Divine Wards
masterOfDivineWards.description: Your mastery over divine wards increases the duration of your shields and protective auras.

unbreakableFaithShield.name: Unbreakable Faith (Shield)
unbreakableFaithShield.description: Your faith is your shield. You gain a permanent bonus to all magic resistances.

adjudicatorSynergy.name: Adjudicator's Synergy
adjudicatorSynergy.description: Your purge spells have a chance to restore a small amount of mana. Your utility spells have increased range.

masterOfHolyCleansing.name: Master of Holy Cleansing
masterOfHolyCleansing.description: Your mastery over holy cleansing allows your purges to also provide a small heal.

beaconOfPurity.name: Beacon of Purity
beaconOfPurity.description: You are a beacon of purity, granting nearby allies increased resistance to curses and poisons.

consecratedVanquisherSynergy.name: Consecrated Vanquisher Synergy
consecratedVanquisherSynergy.description: Your exorcism spells have a chance to consecrate the ground under the target. Your utility spells are more effective on Unholy targets.

masterOfBanishment.name: Master of Banishment
masterOfBanishment.description: Your mastery over banishment makes your control effects against Undead and Demons last longer.

holySentinel.name: Holy Sentinel
holySentinel.description: You stand as a holy sentinel, granting you increased damage reduction against Unholy creatures.
